title: Litecoin Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will LTC Price skyrocket?
description: Litecoin Price Prediction 2023-2032 BREAKING: Twitter to enable #crypto trading in partnership with eToro. Users searching using a $Cashtag symbol currently see live charts for a select few financial assets, like $LTC. Users will soon be able to click through to eToro & have the option to invest in #Litecoin. Is Litecoin silver to Bitcoin’s ... Read more

title: Cardano’s Hydra Head Scaling Solution Receives Major Upgrade
description: Cardano’s groundbreaking scaling solution, Hydra Head, has recently undergone a significant upgrade, solidifying its position as a cutting-edge Layer-2 (L2) protocol. With the introduction of timed transaction support and other notable enhancements, the latest version, 0.11.0, promises to push the protocol closer to its performance expectations. This upgrade marks an important milestone for Cardano and ... Read more

title: Quant price stagnates, DigiToads presale approaching $6m as TOADS aims to be a top-100 token

title: Buterin criticizes US crypto policy’s detrimental impact on projects like Solana
description: Ethereum (ETH) creator Vitalik Buterin has expressed concern about the US approach to crypto regulation, particularly the impact on projects like Solana. In a tweet, Buterin expressed sympathy for the affected projects and stated that if Ethereum were to prevail…
